mapper.select: SELECT CONTESTTYPE FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBEREMAIL = #{email} AND PAYED = FALSE
SELECT ID,TITLE,CONTESTTYPE,COMPANY,SERVICEINFO,SECTOR,IDEA,BRIEFING FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBEREMAIL = #{value} AND PAYED = FALSE
SELECT TITLE, CONTESTTYPE, COMPANY, SERVICEINFO, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FIRSTPRIZE, SECONDPRIZE, THIRDPRIZE, BENNER, HIGHTLIGHT,ENDCONTEST, VIEWS FROM CONTEST WHERE ID = #{value}

SELECT CONTEST.ID, CONTEST.TITLE, COUNT(WORK.CONTEST_ID), DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE,CURDATE()) FROM CONTEST LEFT JOIN WORK ON CONTEST.ID = WORK.CONTEST_ID WHERE ENDDATE > CURDATE() GROUP BY WORK.CONTEST_ID
ORDER BY COUNT(WORK.CONTEST_ID)
ORDER BY CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE DESC
ORDER BY CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTEST
WHERE ENDDATE > CURDATE()
WHERE CURDATE() > CONTEST.ENDDATE AND WINNER IS NULL
WHERE WINNER IS NOT NULL

SELECT CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CURDATE()), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT,CONTEST.FULLPRIZE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND CONTEST.ENDDATE > CURDATE() ORDER BY CONTEST.SHOW DESC, CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC

SELECT CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CURDATE()), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT,CONTEST.FULLPRIZE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND CURDATE() > CONTEST.ENDDATE AND WINNER IS NULL ORDER BY CONTEST.SHOW DESC, CONTEST.ENDDATE DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

SELECT CONTEST.TITLE, CONTEST.CONTESTTYPE, MEMBER.NICKNAME, CONTEST.COMPANY, CONTEST.SERVICEINFO, CONTEST.VIEWS, DATEDIFF(CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.STARTDATE), CONTEST.ENDDATE, CONTEST.FIRSTPRIZE, CONTEST.SECONDPRIZE, CONTEST.THIRDPRIZE, CONTEST.HIGHLIGHT, CONTEST.FULLPRIZE FROM CONTEST, MEMBER WHERE CONTEST.MEMBEREMAIL = MEMBER.EMAIL AND WINNER IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CONTEST.STARTDATE DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK(CONTEST_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL,TITLE, CONTENT, THUMBNAILURL) VALUES(#{contest_id},#{email},#{title},#{content},#{thumbnailurl})
